uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model

Class TemplateFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.TemplateFinder

  • public class TemplateFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to locate template files This replaces the built in persistence code from TemplateFile This class caches the templates in the database to allow edits. In addition template includes (from the same group) are implemented here allowing fragments from other template files to be included using a %%include name%% syntax.
